text: That the IOC should add chess to the Olympic Games
That soccer should abolish the offside rule
That all team sports should abolish timeouts
That we should always use the Oxford, Harvard or serial comma
That prepositions are not words to end sentences with
That the passive voice should be banned
That Harry Potter should have married Luna Lovegood
That house elves should be monetarily compensated for their work
That the Sorting Hat should not take students' personal attributes into account
That laws forbidding indecent exposure should have an exception for hot days
That we regret the development of different fashion lines for men and women
That it is unprofessional to wear jandals to work
That we should not buy Apple
That highly profitable technology companies should not be eligible for any tax credits
That we support the rise of computer science at the expense of the humanities
That we should stop using cash
That we support the rise of cryptocurrencies
That private organisations should be allowed to compete in providing currency
That we should abolish all national days
That we regret the existence of Valentine's Day
That we should rename Christmas with a name that is religiously neutral
That we support the genetic modification of fruit for taste
That tomatoes are a fruit
That we should only ever buy local fruit
That we regret the rise of emoji in everyday language
That languages other than English should actively resist Anglicisms
That text speak is harming the literacy of our children
That the toilet seat should be left down
That a flatmate's partner should contribute to rent for every night they stay over
That all food left on the dining table should be assumed to be for everyone
